title: David Raikuna
text:
David Raikuna (born 24 August 1987 in <a href="Suva">Suva, Fiji</a>), is a professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He currently plays for <a href="Stade%20Rochelais">Stade Rochelais</a> in the <a href="Top%2014">Top 14</a>. He has also played for the <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20rugby%20sevens%20team">New Zealand sevens team</a>. Raikuna plays predominantly as a winger, although has the ability to cover centre and fullback.
Career.
Raikuna made his debut for Counties Manukau in 2010, before signing with North Harbour for the 2011 season. In the same year, he was selected for the New Zealand sevens team. He was signed by the <a href="Blues%20%28Super%20Rugby%29">Blues</a> for the 2012 season and made his <a href="Super%20Rugby">Super Rugby</a> debut against the <a href="Crusaders%20%28rugby%29">Crusaders</a> in the first round of the competition.
